settings.heading: coming soon.
settings.newsletter_text: we bring you natural skincare products formulated with organic plant-based blends to take your skin back to it’s bare basics.

settings.html:
wholesomely hand-crafted –with love– to heal skin naturally + reveal your underlying radiance.



browse all products

settings.title: what shipping carrier do you use?
settings.answer: we offer shipping options from both ups + usps priority mail to ship each order.

settings.title: how long does it take you to ship my order?
settings.answer: please allow about 5 to 7 business days for us to process + ship out any order you place.

settings.title: can i return my product?
settings.answer: unfortunately we are not accepting returns at this time. however, if your product arrives damaged or broken, please reach out to us via our contact page as soon as possible so we can work with you to make it right. our goal is for you to always be satisfied + have an ultimate positive shopping experience with us!

settings.title: what if i have an allergic reaction to my product?
settings.answer: our products are hand-crafted from only natural, plant-based materials to not only soothe skin, but also to minimize the chance of any irritation or allergic reactions -- however, everyone is unique! to keep you informed, we post our full ingredient lists for every product both on our website, as well as on custom card inserts that come included with every order. please review the ingredient lists before purchasing any product, and be sure to test-spot each product you purchase on a small section of your skin before using with liberal application.

settings.title: what does ‘plant-based’ mean? is this the same as ‘vegan’ products?
settings.answer: plant-based means that the ingredients we use come from plant materials that are considered food-grade + sourced from nature. vegan is defined as not containing or being processed through any exposure to animals or animal products. the reason we classify our products as ‘plant-based’ instead of ‘vegan’ is due to one primary ingredient we use: raw honey. although raw honey is a substance derived from only natural plant material, it is produced through bees so it is not technically classified as ‘vegan’.

settings.html:
a divine set

"i saw an ad of this series on instagram and it was so cute i couldn't stop myself from purchasing it! not only is the packaging gorgeous and unique with a very high-quality feel to it, but the actual products themselves are all so divine. my skin is very sensitive and each product seems to offer different, but equally powerful benefits. so happy i stumbled across this hidden gem of a skincare line!"

– melissa

glow up bundle

so good!

"this honey mask is amazing. smells delicious and is super gentle on my sensitive skin! my face feels so soft and refreshed afterwards. truly loving the results so far"

– liv

liquid gold face mask


love, love, love!

"love all the products, but this is by far my favorite! running through it like water! love the scent, the feel, and the after glow! full on skingasm!!"

– nicole

luminous cleansing toner


heavenly

"so i regret buying the small size because i fell in love with this! it’s thick with a luscious whipped texture but still super light and fluffy. i love using it as a hand cream too, a little seems to go a long way."

– abbi

whipped face butter
